website_summaries.verdict: This durable, quilted moving blanket is made with recycled cotton padding.
pros: Quilted tarp design can be used for more than just moving, with activities such as picnics and soundproofing
cons: Only one blanket, so it could be expensive to buy all you need for a move

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had found these sooner
customer_reviews.text: I paid over $75 for literally exactly the same blanket from a professional audio website for my homemade vocal booth. This was less than $15 (+ shipping)... Two of these hung up by hooks made the perfect vocal booth. It's nearly completely "dead" in this thing now.
customer_reviews.author: Jack MacArthur

customer_reviews.title: Quality! Good sound resistance
customer_reviews.text: Used to keep the sound down on my apartment door. Works great. Superb quality. Well stitched. NO ODOR
customer_reviews.author: Paul Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Also makes for good soundproofing material (for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Also makes for good soundproofing material (for the high range, for low range you just need a lot of mass)
customer_reviews.author: Abe Kline

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: 71x78 is not 72x80. Just nothng that. Now that I know the ACTUAL size, I will probably order some more for a simple project I am doing.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality or look I wanted, sewing was defective too
customer_reviews.text: I returned this as I felt the incomplete sewing was a defect. I was also not impressed with either the thickness or color (which was not as deep blue as depicted in the ad). I use these to protect my cargo area in my SUV and to add some sound deadening (as a small additional factor). I am looking for some heavy-duty sewn quality blankets (a few of which I acquired about 10 years ago). I was hoping these would fill that bill, but alas, they did not. I paid about half as much for a very similar blanket from a national retailer.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hawkes

customer_reviews.title: Great Moving Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Well made product! We used this to move some furniture and it's now being used as an extra dog bed protector. This blanket is strong as my dog is constantly scratching at it and it has remained together. Washed it and it was a bit softer but still strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nybeck

customer_reviews.title: Using this in the back of my SUV for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this in the back of my SUV for the dogs. Holds up to large dogs jumping in and out of the SUV.
customer_reviews.author: colavs

customer_reviews.title: Not A Thick Moving Blanket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket because I heard it was great for sound dampening due to its thickness. I planned on hanging it up over noisy windows in my apartment. Well... this blanket is no longer made thick and doesn't do very much for sound dampening. It's so thin now that when you put it up against the window light shines through in some areas. The manufacturer must have changed how it's made. Not a happy buyer right now. Shame too, people who bought this blanket in the past were really happy with the results and now it's just a flimsy cheap blanket.
customer_reviews.author: P.S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and worth its price
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what some are complaining about. For the price you cant expect this cashmere cover or something. It is sturdy and has a good weight to it. Does the job to to a tee. Covers furniture well, and feels like it'll handle a light sprinkle if your in transit with covered furniture in the back. It well worth its price, and you can't go wrong getting this item. could work well for a picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great for sound dampening.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not using these blankets for their intended purpose, but as sound dampening wall in a sound booth. I can’t say if they are good at protecting furniture, but they are definitely this enough to drown out sound.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lee

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty as described , using as soundproofing room
customer_reviews.text: The size is great for putting over my window , still have curtains to make the room look normal . Greatly reduced the sound coming from my neighbors animals and also needed it to reduce sunlight as I recently bought a VR system that gets affected by UV/sun . Bought 2 of these for both windows and definitely will buy again in the future if I need to do something similar or even use it for the attended purpose .
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: PAY ATTENTION Not machine washable
customer_reviews.text: Guess it’s technically my fault for typing “machine washable” and not dissecting the actual description that reads “Not machine washable.” For $10 more buy something actually truly washable and reusable. It may suit your needs but for me it was a waste of money and now goes to the landfill. Annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a moving blanket, not good
customer_reviews.text: While the blanket seems thick enough and will work well as a moving blanket, it smells like dust, badly. I cannot keep this in the house because of the smell and I don't even want it in the garage. Oddly enough, it smells like the inside of a moving truck and now I know why. It says hand wash only, which is pretty tough on a heavy blanket. Not sure if I should risk damaging my washing machine to try washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great strong material
customer_reviews.text: Nice big thick blanket, not too heavy. I use it to cover my glass carboys full of spring water. It’s pretty water resistant BTW. Good material.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: CRAPPY
customer_reviews.text: Like felt material. Didn't hold up, ripped, shredded, waste of money. Bought it for my dogs. My husky tore it up....
customer_reviews.author: Kiva Huffman

customer_reviews.title: good soundproofing
customer_reviews.text: Hang this up, and place this into the direction you are speaking, usually behind the camera, and the echo is noticeably reduced. Ordered another. Echo is reduced from 10 to like a 3 with just one blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Forever Neil

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality than I expected! Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I needed these ASAP & was a little worried that, at such a good price, they would be thin & poor quality. Man, I was really wrong! These are great thickness & perfect size for what I needed them for - I'd say I'll be ordering more, but I bet these last me quite some time (or my grown kids will 'borrow' them LOL!) But when I do need more I'll definitely be ordering more of these (or telling my kids to buy their own here! LOL)
customer_reviews.author: Magzilla

customer_reviews.title: Use a moving blanket on the beach all my life!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I’ve used these as my beach blanket throughout my years. Actually it was my dad who did it and now I do it also. It has weight so it stays down on beach plus what’s ever out that as far as beach blanket can’t compare to this moving blanket. Feel like your laying on a pad. It’s great. Lay your gear up on it, your cooler, what ever you like. It serves me great through out my life. I need a new one. Spilled paint on other one so that one got me 15 years use. I received new one and it’s just like the old one. Comfortable and cheap to buy. 😉😁
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs NYC

customer_reviews.title: I am not completely sure of the rating I should ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not completely sure of the rating I should give to this blanket, since I only used it lightly to protect the trunk of my car when I put in a disassembled bike. However, I give 5 stars because it looks and feels as advertised. It is thick enough, but apparently there are truly "woven" blankets at a higher price and presumably quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Randomly

customer_reviews.title: paper not cotton
customer_reviews.text: i purchased based on reviews. I received a blanket that appeared to be made of paper fiber. it would never make it through a wash. Poor quality control or the manufacturer thought they could get away with a lesser product
customer_reviews.author: Northern CA

customer_reviews.title: Great value vs. cheap imitations
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many moving blankets over the years for my video production company. These come in handy for sound baffling, protecting expensive gear and covering gear to prevent theft. I saw the cheaper 8, 10, 12 packs for $50-$100- but you do get what you pay for. This product is well worth $15 if you don’t want some cheap imitation that rips easily, has bad stitching and bogus stuffing. I already purchased another since the value far exceeds how much I’ve paid for similar blankets in the past from B&H and other video suppliers. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moving blanket covers and protects
customer_reviews.text: This heavy duty padded blanket does just as described. Projects my new bookcase. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: The manufacturing of these blankets are awsome.
customer_reviews.text: I got this blanket to use during moving very old antiques and prized items. I was very happy and shocked actually at the manufacturing and the quality of the product and would buy it again. I protected my items very well and cushioned the glasses/windows very well.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa F. stills

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This blanket isn’t the top of my list but it isn’t at the bottom of my list. I purchased this mat for me to use at the beach since I used a similar one when I was a kid. I’ve only used it twice and the thread is already starting to come loose. It’s ok but could be better
customer_reviews.author: Tatum Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Solid blanket protects
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic for moving things around. I move a lot of heavy and sharp metallic goods in the back of my Prius, so these keep things from sliding around and also from tearing into the seats or trunk cloth. There's enough cloth to use as a wrap. After a month they are not showing any signs of falling apart as cheaper blankets might.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Rough stitching.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed in the quality. The second I unfolded it I could see multiple loose threads and stitching. It would probably work great for moving but I bought it for my shop and isn't up to my standards.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McGee

customer_reviews.title: A MUST - SO MANY USES
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a whim for a love but man, I absolutely love these things. Not only did they help on the move but they helped: protect the floors while we assembled new furniture, as a staging area to break down boxes, and as temporary rugs! I am definitely keeping these around.
customer_reviews.author: VHR

customer_reviews.title: Moving blanket?
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say but this product is portrayed as a moving blanket. It doesn’t say anywhere that it is a disposable single use product. I used it once and it is in shreds and disintegrating. Of course we all know we get what we pay for and this fake blanket was cheap to buy and even more cheaply made. Pay a little more and get one you can use more than once.
customer_reviews.author: john in Sonoma

customer_reviews.title: It’s not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This is not a heavy duty moving blanket . I’ve only had this blanket for about one month in the back of my car and the threads are already pulling out , it’s not heavy duty , it is lightweight material .. The reviews on this blanket must be fake or the purchaser has never seen a good heavy duty moving blanket . I would not buy this blanket again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I used it as a picnic blanket for an outdoor show. It turned out to be very windy that day and ours was one of the few not flying away. It's not the thickest moving blanket I've seen but it worked really well for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chipped Polish

customer_reviews.title: Very nice blankets!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering these blankets! They are great! Just the right weight for all my needs, including covering animal crates for warmth and for many other uses. They are made well and don't have any strange smells, strings, etc. Ordering another one today!
customer_reviews.author: S. Houston

customer_reviews.title: Used to move tons of trash from renovation
customer_reviews.text: Layed moving blanket out in the trunk of my SUV and it worked wonders. Provides lots of protection for the carpet in the back and the prevents scratching all around the interior. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I keep this blanket in the back of my SUV to protect the rear when I have things from Home Depot or I am transporting my 92 year old fathers Walker. I really like it. Its made well and the colors are bright,
customer_reviews.author: Red Baby

customer_reviews.title: Overwhelming smell and not a good one!
customer_reviews.text: The moving blanket looked fine but the smell about knocks me out!! It was a horrible chemical smell. The washing instructions were to hand wash in cold water and not put in the dryer. I ended up putting in washer on cold because I needed the blanket asap otherwise I definitely would of returned it.
customer_reviews.author: fishing in Ms

customer_reviews.title: Not "Heavy-Duty"
customer_reviews.text: Please remove the wording "heavy duty" from your description as they NOT. They are thin, cheap, nock-offs with loose unfinished threads on edges and are only good for one time use. They puncture and tare easily on the move.
customer_reviews.author: Cubbyg

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a move
customer_reviews.text: I used it to move out of an apartment complex down stairs for things like my mattresses and stuff I didn't want scraping the ground. It worked very well, and goes nicely as a truck-bed liner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So many uses for this
customer_reviews.text: We use this to make a tent over a small table outdoors so our older outdoor cat has a warm bed protected from the wind and cold in winter. We have a heated bed inside and it is her favorite place to sleep on cool nights.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up from me
customer_reviews.text: bought this to block out noise -hanging over a window-nails go through real easy-HUGE-bigger than expected-i folded it twice and nailed it by myself real easy-helps great with sound blocking
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Functions as it was intended. My only gripe is ...
customer_reviews.text: Functions as it was intended. My only gripe is there were a ton of loose threads all over the blanket that needed to be removed to prevent snagging on things. Functionality wise, you get what you want and I can't complain much.
customer_reviews.author: That Irish guy

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: We were moving my great granddaughter's new baby bed and wanted it protected from getting scratched. After an hour and half move, the bed was in perfect condition. This cover did it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda R. Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Paid for itself after one use!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is LARGE, durable, cushy, and just about perfect for any job. Saved my knees, floor and sensitive wood parts being assembled. Does exactly what it's supposed to do. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: John A. Mickus

customer_reviews.title: Soft outer fabric easy on furniture
customer_reviews.text: Bought two blankets to move antique armoires a few hundred miles. The blankets were soft and well stitched and did a great job protecting the furniture from the movings straps and bungees. A few holes developed from some sharper corners rubbing during the drive, but this was not a surprise given the weight of the furniture and the distance driven. For the price, these did a great job and I would buy again for a future move.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Beall

customer_reviews.title: Good value and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money. Can be used for moving blankets but then for throws or blankets around the house. A friend wanted to make a podcasting recording booth and I suggested these blankets to hang on the walls for sound abatement. She loved them.
customer_reviews.author: R.A. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Work's for my use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my car to go underneath my car cover to protect it during hail storms. The blankets are a good thickness and plenty soft to avoid scratch my car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great, enough said. I used it to cover the back seat in my grand Cherokee because of my 2dogs. I don’t have it secured it stays in place .my pups are German Sheppards..
customer_reviews.author: Don Bell

customer_reviews.title: Working great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I am actually using these as audio matts. They are keeping reflections out of my microphone. I built a kind of vocal booth using these. They have been really great for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Falk

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a stop gap arrangement to use in my car. I was pleasantly surprised with its quality and it also was durable as I just put it through a tough road trip.
customer_reviews.author: rams

customer_reviews.title: Nice blankets for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed some inexpensive moving blankets and these are perfect. Great size, well made, and did the trick. Will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Alot of room for improvement!
customer_reviews.text: Almost desintergated from 1st wash. Material could be a lot better but it is what it is for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Creek

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Used this to move a bed in a minivan. It protected the headboard and footboard very well. Offered great protection and nothing was scratched. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hays

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty?
customer_reviews.text: Not what I would call a Heavy Duty moving blanket and I have work for a moving company. Oh incase you care, it’s made in China. So that recycled material came from who knows where.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I used it for
customer_reviews.text: Used for sound dampening in a closet converted into a vocal booth. Cost efficient and worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Used for woodworking
customer_reviews.text: Used these blankets to protect my desk from scratches while I put the hard wax/oil on both sides. Thick enough to protect and soft enough to not scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony I.

customer_reviews.title: If you want to choke on particles in your nose.
customer_reviews.text: Bro, It's easy to rip open, the filling inside is toxic, it doesn't stop much sound, and it's heavier than it should be.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the quality but gets the job done. Not sure it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KateSpaid

customer_reviews.title: Heavy blanket
customer_reviews.text: I use these for camping trips to put under air mattress. They are good quality and are very heavy. Would recommend this item to anyone that needs a heavy moving blanket. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kayaking Source

customer_reviews.title: Gone downhill since I started purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I use it to cover a cage. For $4 can get a thicker one at Lowe's. I paid for the convenience of online. UPDATE 6/30/20 This product has gotten ridiculously thin. Same price- less quality. I removed a star
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good feel and protection. Use for finished woodworking projects so I can put them flat on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great to have on hand.
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction and clean even seems. This moving blanket is great to keep in the car wether it’s for a ground covering, a way to keep the car clean and un-damaged when transporting rough, heavy or dirty objects or people. Not as thick as some moving blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Collin T.

customer_reviews.title: Uses for pet
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 1 yr old lab/terrier mix. She's a pretty aggressive chewer but so far the blanket has held up. It's only been a couple weeks but so far so good. The blanket is very sturdy and the quality of the fabric is great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. I bought this particular blanket because it was washable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my suv from scratches. Works very well. I bought this particular blanket because it was washable.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my needs, although it’s a little thin. But it works.
customer_reviews.author: paola silva

customer_reviews.title: Has held up so far, been about 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I use it both for working on my jeep to lay on and also set my doors on it when I take them off. It's quite soft and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for......no where near what movers use....paper thin, ripped the first time using it to transport a gas grill
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Best Moving Pads You Can Buy
customer_reviews.text: We find ourselves constantly transporting breakable items in our cars and wanted something that would be better than a blanket or other padding. These are outstanding. They are thick, soft and are the best pads that I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy1

customer_reviews.title: Protects my car
customer_reviews.text: I use this when loading and unloading my Kayak from the roof of my car and it works great for protecting the car from scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: new
customer_reviews.text: nice and thick works great for what i use it for
customer_reviews.author: bruce nestle

customer_reviews.title: VERY MOLDY AND SMELLY BLANKETS
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't use these on my beautifully upholstered and expensive furnishings. Returned. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: ew

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice moving blanket! Just enough cushion and thickness, and a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ECDC

customer_reviews.title: Ok overall - but good for 12 bucks
customer_reviews.text: Not much use so far so time will tell but my main complaint at this point is really that material is super slick.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Carlson

customer_reviews.title: A little thin
customer_reviews.text: It is okay the material is a little thin but I will do the job
customer_reviews.author: Lianna Albert

customer_reviews.title: This does not absorb sound at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because someone suggested that this had sound absorbing properties. That is not true. Sound goes trough it easily. I am going to try painting it with Flex Seal, the spray version, to see if it improves. And to see if it becomes an odor and light barrier, another thing it fails to do. Let me clarify. For storing and moving things, it is a excellent product. I like the blue color. It is lightweight and has a good amount of padding.
customer_reviews.author: TecBohem

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought...
customer_reviews.text: When held up you can see light through the stitching. A very lame quilt
customer_reviews.author: Marye young

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My dog shredded this blanket in one day. It is definitely not the same quality as the blankets you get at actual moving companies
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Leslie B

customer_reviews.title: Got these to hang up in my closet to dampen sound during recording
customer_reviews.text: and they are very, very good. Heavy, well-stitched, easy to hang from clamps. Definitely muffles noises.
customer_reviews.author: Lilyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Good general purpose moving blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Decent thickness - bought one to protect my car while I was moving apartments. Thickness is decent, durability is not bad - had a surface level tear from snagging it on a corner of furniture, but otherwise good.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Storage Protection
customer_reviews.text: Found a great deal on a double oven that I needed to store until the kitchen remodel was completed. This protective cover worked very well with the Heavy Weight Flat Bungee Cords 4 PACK from LDI International.
customer_reviews.author: High Desert Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Awesome moving blanket for the money are use this to write very high-quality made furniture for moving
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is too thin than I expect. It is useless for me. Disappointed about it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: It's well made. It's a moving blanket, not a dog blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pets
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs jump on the couch when we leave for home this is perfect to keep the Huskies hair off
customer_reviews.author: sshockey

customer_reviews.title: Well made moving blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Well made moving blanket. Used them for a move. Worked great. I'm sure I'll be using them for everyday type hauling in my SUV too.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S.

customer_reviews.title: it's a moving blanket
customer_reviews.text: Good for padding furniture or if you have some work do to and you don't want to scratch hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The blankets came promptly and are of thick and durable quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty  good
customer_reviews.text: Have it as a trunk liner works well so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Item was 60 inches x 72 inches not 73.5 inches x 80 inches as stated in the description. Unable to use as intended. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep in our trunk to protect the interior and have been very pleased with it. Not super thick but perfect for protecting our trunk cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Troutwine

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: Large size and very thick. Perfect for insulating objects from bumps and scratches.
customer_reviews.author: PAZ

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected. I may order another one to use as a liner in the back of my Enclave when I transport my gear.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: well padded
customer_reviews.text: nice large size and quilting seems good to pad and protect .. I should get alot of use out of this
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great for a lot of things and washable
customer_reviews.text: Love it I use it for every car for back seat I fold accordingly to my back seat so my kids don’t dirty my seats & it’s washable !!!
customer_reviews.author: Queen illie

customer_reviews.title: They're... moving blankets
customer_reviews.text: I've used these a few times. They seem to be of good quality blankets. So far, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Mike

customer_reviews.title: Should work just fine
customer_reviews.text: Appear well made and should do the job just fine. Not the cheapest ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, maybe a little pricey, but came in good, clean condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Thickness has Changed
customer_reviews.text: Been ordering these for the past few months and suddenly this last shipment the thickness has decreased. Will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for back of SUV for my dog and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: No smell at all!! Bought for back of SUV for my dog and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We needed these to wrap our $5,000 dining table. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: worked great!
customer_reviews.text: worked great to protect my furniture during my move. so far they are durable and hold up well. I will update this post again after my next move and see how well they hold up after a large move!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Altwegg

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Good moving blanket decent size and has worked good for me
customer_reviews.author: JOHN M.

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a dog blanket. My 6 month old husky tore it to shreds in a couple of hours! It's not listed for a dog blanket. So...it's not necessarily a bad blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Barron

product_meta.title: Moving Blanket for Protecting Furniture- Heavy Duty Recycled Cotton Padded Tarp, Multi Purpose- Pets, Camping, Hunting, Picnics and More by Stalwart
product_meta.description:
Protect your furniture while moving with professional quality using Stalwart’s Moving Blanket! These double side quilted tarps utilize recycled cotton padding to ensure your belongings are safe from surface damage while moving or while in storage. Cloth binding covers all edges and corners of the blanket, making a durable finish that will last. Blanket also works great for picnics, preventing pet damage to couches, and even sound absorption!

feature_bullets: PROTECTION- Recycled cotton padding works hard to protect your belongings and vehicles from damage during a move or while in storage! Padding also creates a soft surface for camping or picnics.

MULTI USE PAD- This versatile pad can protect furniture and vehicles from dings and scratches during a move, cover couch to prevent pet damage, use for sound absorption, cover stored belongings to prevent dust or moisture buildup and more!
RECYCLED MATERIALS- The soft, protective padding that fills this double sided blanket is made from a soft recycled cotton material that is good for your furniture and the earth.

DURABLE QUILTED BUILD- Zig zag double stitching on this packing blanket combined with cloth binding on all corners and edges make for a long lasting, strong multi use blanket! 100% Polyester cloth build ensures multiple uses and a long life for this pad.
